response.overview: Since the inaugural race at Brands Hatch in September 2005, A1GP has set a new standard in motorsport with its exciting, close racing. The 2007/08 season saw drama and intrigue at every turn, with a record ten different ations winning races. Follow your nation in what proved to be the closest title-race yet, as 23 cars and countries battled it out to be crowned the World Cup of Motorsport winners.
response.title: A1 GP 2007-2008 Review
